p.b:
The USD 353 Board of Education will hold
a planning session on
Monday, April 27, 2020 at 7:00 p.m.

br.em:
In order to remain in accordance with
current meeting guidelines set forth
by KSDE in regard to the health
regulations of COVID-19, this meeting
will only be available to the public
via Facebook Live. The meeting will
also be recorded and posted
on this website.
